Text: I had the vinyl version and wore it out. Bought the cd when it was released, too. Never got around to converting it. A real classic!!
Thanks mate!  One of my favorite albums from when I was a kid.  I also had it on vinyl and wore it out.  This, Aja by Steely Dan and Breakfast in America were my late 70's favs.
There's a lot of worn out vinyl out there. I have my own, too. Thank you so much.
